summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the moratorium on acceptance and issuance of permits for the demolition or change of use of low-income rental housing downtown, to authorize acceptance and issuance of permits for the demolition of low-income rental housing structures downtown which include a voluntary agreement pursuant to RCW 82.02.020 to mitigate the direct impact of the demolition by amending Section 5 of Ordinance 114874.
